definition: ring/hoop/loop/(chain) link/classifier for scores in archery etc/to surround/to encircle/to hem in
flour/noodles/(of food) soft (not crunchy)/(slang) (of a person) ineffectual/spineless
face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc

sentences.english: We study the grid graph and the honeycomb rectanglar torus and honeycomb rhombic torus accordingly.
sentences.chinese: 笔者对格图和环面蜂巢图作了相应的研究。

sentences.english: A torus can be obtained from a rectangle by identifying opposite sides.
sentences.chinese: 环面可由矩形把其两对对边分别重叠起来而得到。

sentences.english: The paper put forward principle and object of straight profile circular plane worm's optimization design.
sentences.chinese: 根据提出的直廓环面蜗杆优化设计的原则和目标。

sentences.english: Worm gearing with straight profile hour-glass worm is a prominent drive.
sentences.chinese: 直廊环面蜗轮副是一种很好的传动副。

sentences.english: The proposed method is very valuable for the further study on the plane double enveloping hourglass worm pair.
sentences.chinese: 对于进一步分析滚锥包络环面蜗杆副传动非常有价值。

definition: end face/end surface of a cylindrical object
six-sided figure (such as a cube or parallelepiped)
to rotate about an axis/axis of rotation (math.)
